A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a disaster...perhaps the worst Star Wars \"anything\" since the Christmas special\, which had better acting than this. It was edited poorly\, and the whole casino part could have been deleted in favor of a better\, deeper story. Yes it makes total sense for 20 giant ships to keep shooting at the back of a smaller ship for 12 hours\, god forbid you just encircle it and finish it off in 5 minutes. They ruined Lukes storyline established 40 years ago. This movie should be pulled from theaters and they should remake it completely and pretend this never happened.
